text: "Noctiluca II: Murderous Route" (Yakouchu Satsujinkoro) is a novel game released by Athena for the Nintendo 64 on October 22, 1999. It is a sequel to "Noctiluca" released in 1995, and although the worldview is the same, there is no connection between the two stories.It is the only sound novel game on the Nintendo 64.
title: Noctiluca II ~Murder Route~
